title: Ali Bilgin
text:
Ali Bilgin (born 17 December 1981) is a former <a href="Germany">German</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player of <a href="Turkey">Turkish</a> descent. His versatility and ability to use both feet allows him to fill in at various positions if needed. One of his former clubs is <a href="Rot-Weiss%20Essen">Rot-Weiss Essen</a> which got promotion to <a href="2.%20Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a> in the 2005–06 season.
Bilgin has made his debut for Antalyaspor in <a href="Sakaryaspor">Sakaryaspor</a> match on 13 August 2006 as a 66th min substitute.
After an impressive season at Antalyaspor, he got a full health check up and underwent a medical examination on 30 June 2007 and then signed a contract on 2 July 2007 for 3+1 years.
